name: reseau des colectivites territoriales pour une économie solidaire
goal:
gather french local authorities at any level which are conducting a public and local policy in the fiel of social economy.
gives elected people and services tools and méthods to implement their policy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Member of the european committee of the french national COUNCIL of social and solidarity économy.

works witth networks REVES and Eurocities
